response.page_content:
uid=1_0 RootWebArea ""
  uid=1_1 HeaderAsNonLandmark "" name="API Testing Interface"
    uid=1_2 Heading "POST /api/v1/quotes Contract Testing"
    uid=1_3 text "Contract Test: POST /api/v1/quotes - T005"
  uid=1_4 MainAsMain ""
    uid=1_5 Section "Test Results"
      uid=1_6 Heading "Success Cases"
        uid=1_7 text "✓ should return 201 Created with proper JSON structure for valid quote"
        uid=1_8 text "❌ should correctly calculate totals for multiple items"
        uid=1_9 text "❌ should handle quotes with discounts correctly"
        uid=1_10 text "❌ should generate unique quote numbers for concurrent requests"
      uid=1_11 Heading "Validation Error Cases"
        uid=1_12 text "✓ should return 400 Bad Request for missing required fields"
        uid=1_13 text "✓ should return 400 Bad Request for invalid item data"
        uid=1_14 text "✓ should return 400 Bad Request for empty items array"
        uid=1_15 text "❌ should return 400 Bad Request for invalid discount values"
      uid=1_16 Heading "Business Logic Validation"
        uid=1_17 text "✓ should set proper default values for new quotes"
        uid=1_18 text "❌ should generate proper expiry date (default 30 days)"
      uid=1_19 Section "API Response Structure"
        uid=1_20 text "POST /api/v1/quotes"
        uid=1_21 text "Expected: 201 Created"
        uid=1_22 text "Content-Type: application/json"
        uid=1_23 text "Response includes: id, quoteNumber, customerId, lineItems, totals"
    uid=1_24 Section "Technical Debt Identified"
      uid=1_25 text "🔴 CRITICAL: 3 items (line item calculation, discount calculation, unique ID generation)"
      uid=1_26 text "🟡 HIGH: 1 items (discount validation)"
      uid=1_27 text "🟠 MEDIUM: 2 items (response structure, date comparison)"
      uid=1_28 text "📋 Generated Tasks: T014.1, T014.2, T014.3, T014.4"
